Key Match Events: Sri Lanka posted a 5 wicket win over the West Indies in the first one-day international at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium on Sunday.
The Windies made 185/4 in 38.3 overs in the rain-hit match before the hosts made 234/5 in 31.5 overs of the truncated 37 overs to clinch the game on DLS method with 31 deliveries to spare.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 20 overs per side.
